content: Hi David, thank you for reading and providing the additional examples of those who showed their hand. I was unaware of MeetUp’s resist groups. There’s an added element that I didn’t include in my post but I feel like you alluded to a bit which is the ability to be publicly shamed with social media these days. In the past, even if you knew that a CEO or politician leaned a particular way, there wasn’t much you could do about it, but public shaming has returned to society with force, so it’s particularly difficult to show your hand or not these days.
